news.headline: Billionaires Lose Combined $208 Billion in One Day From Trump Tariffs
news.summary: (Bloomberg) -- The world’s 500 richest people saw their combined wealth plunge by $208 billion Thursday as broad tariffs announced by President Donald Trump sent global markets into a tailspin. news.headline: Trump Says TikTok Deal Within Reach, Involves Multiple Investors
news.summary: (Bloomberg) -- President Donald Trump said the US was close to unveiling a plan that would spare the Chinese-owned social media app TikTok from a US ban, with multiple investors involved in discussions for a deal.Most Read from BloombergHousing Agency Aims to Relocate Its DC HeadquartersMetro-North

news.headline: Stocks Plummet as World Leaders Respond to Trump Tariff Blitz
news.summary: U.S. stock indexes saw their biggest drop in value since March 2020, one day after President Trump announced a 10% across-the-board tariff for all foreign imports, and higher rates for other countries.

news.headline: Plenty of Tariff Pain for Big Tech, From Supply Chains to Advertising Impact
news.summary: Tech stocks were pummeled Thursday following President Trump’s earlier tariff announcement, a sign of how vulnerable the sector is to a possible recession as well as to higher prices on everything from consumer goods to hardware.
